datasets.title: Freetown, Sierra Leone Flood Hazard Maps
datasets.description: Freetown, Sierra Leone Flood Maps (Undefended) - River and Surface Water Hazard Assessment
datasets.purpose: To support the Government of Sierra Leone and relevant stakeholders in understanding comprehensive flood risk from both riverine and surface water sources in Freetown.

project.name: Selection # 1279998 / Consultancy Services to develop capacities and capabilities in relation to climate, weather and disaster risk management services in Sierra Leone

datasets.details: This flood hazard dataset comprises two complementary hazard types: (1) River flood maps modeling fluvial flooding from river overflow and channel exceedance, and (2) Surface water flood maps modeling pluvial flooding from direct rainfall and inadequate drainage.

entity.name: Global Facility for Disaster Reduction and Recovery (GFDRR)

resources.title: Freetown River Flood Map - 20 Year Return Period (Undefended)
resources.description: River (fluvial) flood hazard map showing flood depth for a 1-in-20 year return period event in Freetown, Sierra Leone. Undefended scenario without flood defenses. 1-meter resolution raster depth data in WGS84 coordinate system (EPSG:4326). April 2023 version.
